summary: Frontend testing of Team page updates completed successfully. All requested features (Direct Team tab, WhatsApp share, Copy Link) are working correctly.
passed_tests: Team page loads correctly with all sections
Three tabs present: Direct Team, All Levels, All Members
Direct Team tab is selected by default (data-state='active')
Copy Link button in header visible and clickable
Share on WhatsApp button in header visible and clickable
WhatsApp share opens correct URL (api.whatsapp.com/send/) with pre-filled message
Message contains referral link with user's referral code
Empty state shows 'No Direct Referrals Yet' message
Empty state has Copy Referral Link button
Empty state has Share on WhatsApp button
Tab switching works correctly (Direct Team → All Levels → All Members)
Profile completion flow working for new users
context_for_next_testing_agent: Team page features (Direct Team tab, WhatsApp share, Copy Link) all verified working. New users need to complete profile setup (First Name, Last Name, Mobile Number) before accessing Team page.

direct_team_tab.details: Tab present with icon, selected by default, shows Direct Referrals (Level 1) section

all_levels_tab.details: Tab switches correctly, shows Network Hierarchy view

all_members_tab.details: Tab switches correctly, shows All Team Members view

copy_link_header.details: Button visible in header, triggers clipboard copy with toast notification

whatsapp_share_header.details: Button visible in header, opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message containing referral link

empty_state.details: Shows 'No Direct Referrals Yet' message with Copy Referral Link and Share on WhatsApp buttons
